bundle-jet-4-app-trade.title: Jet App: trade-monitor
bundle-jet-4-app-trade.description: The `trade-monitor` app bundle installs the `trade-monitor` demo as part of the `hazelcast/hazelcast-platform-demos` GitHub repo maintained by Hazelcast.

bundle-jet-3-cluster-trade.title: Jet Cluster: trade
bundle-jet-3-cluster-trade.description: The `trade` cluster bundle installs a Jet cluster that includes the `build_app` script to clone and build the `realtime-trade-monitor` project maintained at the GitHub URL shown below.

bundle-jet-4-docker-cdc_tutorial.title: Jet CDC Tutorial
bundle-jet-4-docker-cdc_tutorial.description: The `cdc_tutorial` bundle wraps the CDC tutorial available from the Hazelcast site [https://jet-start.sh/docs/tutorials/cdc](https://jet-start.sh/docs/tutorials/cdc).
